title: Tristana update rocket jumps onto live!

replies.body: I think she looks pretty cute now =3 also the Christmas themed skin now looks a lot more like the splash! {{champion:18}} all da way!!!!
Adding to this I just noticed that the bag of cannonballs on her back is gone! For a long time I thought that it was a shell of some sort (like a turtle). She looks a lot better now. Good work Rito.

The Early Bird gots the worm {{champion:50}}
